body.p: The Home screen provides easy access to all MiTeam Meetings features and enables you to quickly manage your meetings.

section.title: Start Now
section.p: Use this option to create and join an ad hoc meeting. For more information, see Create a Meeting.

section.title: Schedule
section.p: Use this option to create a scheduled meeting. For more information, see Schedule a Meeting.

section.title: Avatar
section.p: Click your avatar and click Help & About to view the current version of the application, the online help documentation, release notes, privacy policy, and the End User License Agreement. Click Settings to open the settings panel. Click Issues & Feedback to report issues and provide feedback, and click Sign out to sign out of the application.

section.title: My Meetings
section.p: The My meetings section lists all the meetings created and attended by the user.

section.title: Chat Window
section.p: When you click a meeting in the My meetings section, a chat window for that meeting opens, displaying all the previous chat messages sent during the meeting.

section.title: Join now
section.p: To join a meeting, click the meeting from the My meetings section. A side panel opens. Click the Join now button to proceed to join the meeting.

section.title: Edit a Meeting Title
section.p: To edit the title of a scheduled meeting, click the meeting from the My meetings section. A side panel opens. Click and enter the new meeting title. Click Save to save the changes or click Cancel to discard it.

section.title: List of Attendees
section.p: When you click a meeting in the My meetings section, a side panel opens, displaying the list of attendees under the section Attended.

section.title: Meeting Information and Attachments
section.p: To view the details of a meeting, click the meeting from the My meetings section. A side panel opens. Click . Details of the meeting such as the meeting name, access code, and the meeting invite link are displayed. Click Attachments to view the attachments shared in the meeting.

section.title: Dial-In Information
section.p: To view the dial-in information for a meeting, click the meeting from the My meetings section and click . The URL of the meeting, the dial-in number, and the meeting ID are displayed.
